lead_paragraph: The man, Davonte Pressley, 23, was taken to Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center, where he was in critical condition, the police said.

byline.contributor: Sean Piccoli contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.

headline.print_headline: Man Holding Knife Is Shot by an Officer, Officials Say
headline.main: Officer Shoots Man Wielding a Knife in Brooklyn, Police Say

snippet: The man, Davonte Pressley, 23, was taken to Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center, where he was in critical condition, the police said....
abstract: New York City police say Davonte Pressley, man who brandished knife outside laundromat in East Flatbush, Brooklyn, is in critical condition after being shot three times by officer responding to emergency calls.
